tag_list: games, developer, designer, illustrator, animator, interactive
overview:
Gur Ilany is the founder of Samuramu, a mobile game studio based in Tel Aviv. With 10 years of experience in the industry, Gur finds game development to be the best distribution channel for his multi-faceted creative skills.

Previously located in Melbourne, Australia and Boston, MA, Gur is now based in Tel-Aviv, Israel. Apart for making games, his other passions are coffee, travel, writing and playing with kids.
